| History                 = Created during the Japanese tech boom, [[Matsuko Ishii (Earth-616)|Matsuko Ishii]] was founder and CEO of the tech company that began as a small developer of CDs and disk readers, but quickly became a household name. One of Fujinet's earliest shareholders and patrons was [[Silvio Manfredi (Earth-616)|Silvio Manfredi]], who also entered a romantic affair with Matsuko, resulting in the birth of [[Saya Ishii (Earth-616)|Saya Ishii]]. For over 20 years, the company had financial difficulties compensated by Silvio's patronage, and became an international powerhouse under Saya. <!-- {{r|Silk Vol 3 1|4}} -->

When Saya partnered with [[Kasha (Earth-616)|Kasha]] to kill gangs in Queens in a scheme to outshine her father, [[Cindy Moon (Earth-616)|Cindy Moon]] deduced the connection from a goon harassing [[John Jonah Jameson (Earth-616)|J. Jonah Jameson]] with a Fujinet hearing aid. However, Saya learned through Cindy's investigation and company assets that Kasha had an ulterior scheme.{{r|Silk Vol 3 1|4}}
